properties.areaDesc: Charleston Harbor; Coastal waters from South Santee River to Edisto Beach SC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued February 18 at 7:16PM EST by NWS Charleston SC
properties.description:
Webcam and surface observations show areas of sea fog are
beginning to develop along the coastal waters of Charleston
County, mainly from Isle of Palms south to Edisto Beach, including
the Charleston Harbor. Visibilities in the fog could be as low as
1 NM or less at times. A Marine Dense Fog Advisory will likely be
needed later this evening as the fog slowly expands and thickens.
properties.instruction:
Mariners are urged to navigate with extreme care. If you must
navigate in these conditions, proceed with caution. Use proper
fog signals, including fog horns. Make sure all navigational
running lights are on.

Please relay any reports of sea fog to the Charleston Coast Guard
station and ask them to immediately forward your report to the
National Weather Service in Charleston.

NWSheadline: SEA FOG DEVELOPING OFFSHORE OF CHARLESTON COUNTY AND IN CHARLESTON HABOR
